events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision on Main Street during rush hour.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as the incident involved vehicle collision.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident case promptly.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and the customer has been informed about the next steps.
Customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report related to the collision.
Customer submitted all required documents including accident photos and the official police report for review.
Claims team has initiated the investigation to assess damages and liability for the vehicle collision claim.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and damages in line with the submitted evidence for the accident.
A fair settlement offer was proposed based on damage assessment and policy coverage for the accident claim.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely handling and proposed settlement of their auto accident claim.
The claim was formally approved following customer agreement on the settlement terms and coverage.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to the customerâ€™s account promptly.
The claim was officially closed after successful settlement payment and confirmation from the customer.
All case files and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
